page.title: 12RECREATION AND LEISURE.
page.content: Our survey asked people what informal Leisure Activities they did in their spare time.We were surprised by the range and variety. On average the amount of T.V.watching is two hours per night;more in Winter. Children tend to watch more T.V.than average and pensioners less.Adult radio listening averages one hour daily.Pensioners listen to more radio than average and younger children listen only rarely.Some teenagers tune in to 'pop' stations.The 'computer revolution'appears to have made little impact in this area and only three children and one adult stated that they used computers at home. Quite a lot of private reading is done;around ten hours per week.Some older people do much more than this but more active pensioners prefer to walk or do similar outdoor activities.
